summary: Test environment tests fail intermittently on Windows with Node 14, causing CI failures during test execution. The issue appears to be environment-specific flakiness rather than a fundamental bug.
userImpact: Developers on Windows encounter intermittent test failures in CI pipelines, reducing confidence in test results.
workaround: Tests were skipped to work around the failures.
resolutionDetails: No recent occurrences reported; maintainer indicated issue hasn't been seen in a while and appears to have resolved naturally.
keyQuote: I haven't seen these in a while.
